title: No train service between Outram Park & Aljunied due to traction power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于牵引力故障，Outram Park 与 Aljunied 之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara Outram Park & Aljunied kerana kerosakan kuasa tarikan
title_translations.ta: Outram Park & Aljunied இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை, இழுவை மின்சாரக் கோளாறு காரணமாக

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Free regular bus between #OutramPark & #Aljunied have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Free bridging bus services between #OutramPark & #Aljunied have ceased. Free regular bus service is still available.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #OutramPark & #Aljunied have resumed.
[EWL] No train service between #OutramPark & #Aljunied due to a traction power fault near #Bugis.
